mor20-creation-form.title: Protocol creation

general-step.instruction: Please provide the required protocol details across three main sections of the form.

arbitrum-step.token-name-label: The name of the token for your protocol.
arbitrum-step.token-symbol-label: The symbol of the token for your protocol.
arbitrum-step.admin-contract-address-label: Specify the address of the protocol administrator. The administrator will be able to change the settings after deployment on the networks.

settings.title: Uniswap settings
settings.description:
This section configures the parameters for exchanging yield for the project token.
By default, the exchange for the project token is done in 2 swaps. For example wstETH -> wETH and wETH -> {token}.
settings.token-in-address-label: The address of the token on which yield is generated, on the Arbitrum network (e.g. wstETH).
settings.token-out-address-label: The yield token will be exchanged for the current token. For example (wETH).
settings.first-swap-fee-label: Uniswap fee to swap yield token to intermediate token. It is specified as a percentage, usually it is 0.3%.
settings.second-swap-fee-label: Uniswap fee to swap intermediate token to project token. It is specified as a percentage, usually it is 0.3%.

ethereum-step.admin-contract-address-label: Specify the address of the protocol administrator. The administrator will be able to change the settings after deployment on the networks.
ethereum-step.group-instruction: Add the new distribution group to your protocol.

group-builder.withdraw-lock-period-after-stake-placeho: Withdraw lock period after stake (in hours)

mor20-creation-form.tx-sent-message: The transaction was sent, you can view it in the explorer here
mor20-creation-form.success-message: The transaction was confirmed, you can view it in the explorer here

claim-form.tx-sent-message: The transaction was sent, you can view it in the explorer here
claim-form.success-message: The transaction was confirmed, you can view it in the explorer here

claim-modal.title: Claim rewards
claim-modal.subtitle: You are about to Claim Rewards. Your current reward - {reward}

deposit-form.referrer-note: Enter your referrer address or leave the field blank
deposit-form.tx-sent-message: The transaction was sent, you can view it in the explorer here
deposit-form.success-message: The transaction was confirmed, you can view it in the explorer here

deposit-modal.title: Deposit
deposit-modal.subtitle: Your funds will be redirected to the platform. Enter the desired amount, in case of the first transaction, you will need to approve the transfer of funds.

info-bar.description--1: The people who create interfaces and tools for the Morpheus ecosystem are also part of its community.

private-pool-view.claim-at-note: Note: Claim is locked until the specified time

public-pool-view.withdraw-at-note: Note: Withdraw is locked until the specified time
public-pool-view.claim-at-note: Note: Claim is locked until the specified time
public-pool-view.dashboard-description--0: Upon withdrawal, your deposited {token} will be sent to your address. In case of claim, tokens will be minted in the Arbitrum One network. This may take some time.
public-pool-view.dashboard-note--0: Note: You can withdraw your {token} {time} after deposit.

main-page.title: MOR20 Ecosystem
main-page.instruction: It looks like you don't have a MOR20 ecosystem yet. If you want to create one, click the button below.

token.title: Token
token.description: The MOR20 Network Token with integrated LayerZero OFT (Omnichain Fungible Token) standard.

distribution.title: Distribution
distribution.description:
The contract that distributes the
"Token" to the depositors and the team members.

l1-sender.title: L1 Sender
l1-sender.description: A contract that allows to communicate between L1 and L2. It is used to send a minting request to the L2 using the Layer Zero. It is also used to transfer deposited tokens from the L1 to the L2.

l2-msg-receiver.title: L2 Message Receiver
l2-msg-receiver.description: A contract that receives Layer Zero messages from the "L1Sender" contract.

l2-token-receiver.title: L2 Token Receiver V2
l2-token-receiver.description: A contract that receives tokens from the L1Sender contract and used for Uniswap market making with extended functionality.

protocol-creation-page.success-msg: Your protocol has been successfully deployed.

info-dashboard.header-supply-subtitle: Number of stETH circulating in the project in relation to time
info-dashboard.header-earned-subtitle: Number of earned MOR tokens in relation to time
info-dashboard.connection-msg: Your personal deposits, withdrawals and rewards will be displayed here after connecting your MetaMask wallet

validations.field-error_address: Field must be a valid address with prefix "0x"
validations.field-error_ether: Field must contain the amount of tokens
validations.field-error_hex: The field must start with 0x and have a valid hex.
validations.field-error_minEther: Field must be greater than or equal to {min}
validations.field-error_minValue: The entered value is less than the minimum value {min}
validations.field-error_maxValue: Amount should be less than or equal to {max}
validations.field-error_maxLength: Field should not exceed the maximum length {max}
validations.field-error_validUrl: Field must be a valid URL

withdraw-form.tx-sent-message: The transaction was sent, you can view it in the explorer here
withdraw-form.success-message: The transaction was confirmed, you can view it in the explorer here

withdraw-modal.title: Withdraw Funds
withdraw-modal.subtitle: Specify the amount to be withdrawn. The funds will be sent to your wallet.

errors.provider-unauthorized: The requested method and/or account has not been authorized by the user
errors.provider-unsupported-method: The Provider does not support the requested method
errors.provider-disconnected: The Provider is disconnected from all chains
errors.provider-chain-disconnected: The Provider is not connected to the requested chain
errors.provider-invalid-request: JSON is not a valid request object
errors.provider-json-rpc-version-not-supported: Version of JSON-RPC protocol is not supported
errors.provider-wrapper-method-not-found: Provider does not exist or method not supported
errors.fallback-provider: FallbackProvider does not have a signer

notification.default-message-warning: Something you are doing is not recommended
notification.default-message-info: Something is happening. Just want you to know that

change-lock-modal.title: Stake MOR Rewards
change-lock-modal.subtitle: You can postpone the claim of MOR tokens for a period of your choice and get increased MOR rewards. The longer the period, the higher the Power factor, up to 6 years.
change-lock-modal.tx-sent-message: The transaction was sent, you can view it in the explorer here
change-lock-modal.success-message: The transaction was confirmed, you can view it in the explorer here

token-contract-info.description: The contract that distributes the "Token" to the depositors and the team members.

approve.note: NOTE: If amount is the maximum uint256, the allowance is not updated on transferFrom. This is semantically equivalent to an infinite approval.

burn.note: Burn a specific amount of tokens, reducing the total supply.

burnFrom.note: Burn tokens from an account, reducing the total supply.
burnFrom.from-note: Address from which tokens will be burned

decreaseAllowance.note: Decrease the allowance for the spender.
decreaseAllowance.amount-note: Amount to reduce from the allowance

increaseAllowance.note: Increase the allowance for the spender.
increaseAllowance.amount-note: Amount to add to the allowance

transferFrom.note: Transfer tokens from one account to another on behalf of an owner.

transferOwnership.note: Transfer ownership of the contract to a new address.

renounceOwnership.note: Renounce ownership of the contract, leaving it without an owner.

bridge-overplus.note: Bridge overplus by specifying gas limit, maximum fee, and submission cost.
bridge-overplus.gasLimit-note: Enter the gas limit for the transaction
bridge-overplus.maxFee-note: Enter the maximum fee per gas

createPool.note: Create a new pool by specifying the payout start, reward, and other parameters.
createPool.payoutStart-note: Enter the start time for payout
createPool.decreaseInterval-note: Enter the interval for reward decrease
createPool.withdrawLockPeriod-note: Enter the lock period for withdrawals
createPool.claimLockPeriod-note: Enter the lock period for claims
createPool.withdrawLockPeriodAfterStake-note: Enter the lock period for withdrawals after staking
createPool.isPublic-note: Specify whether the pool is public or private

manage-users-in-private-pool.note: Manage users in a private pool by specifying the pool ID, users, and corresponding amounts.
manage-users-in-private-pool.poolId-note: Enter the ID of the pool you want to manage.
manage-users-in-private-pool.users-note: Provide a list of user addresses to manage within the pool.
manage-users-in-private-pool.amounts-note: Specify the amounts associated with each user. Ensure that the number of amounts matches the number of users.

collectFees.note: Collect fees from a specific token ID.
collectFees.tokenId-note: Enter the ID of the token for which you want to collect fees.

decreaseLiquidityCurrentRange.note: Decrease liquidity for a specific token ID within the current range.
decreaseLiquidityCurrentRange.tokenId-note: Enter the ID of the token for which you want to decrease liquidity.
decreaseLiquidityCurrentRange.liquidity-note: Enter the amount of liquidity to decrease.
decreaseLiquidityCurrentRange.amount0Min-note: Specify the minimum amount of token0 to accept.
decreaseLiquidityCurrentRange.amount1Min-note: Specify the minimum amount of token1 to accept.

increaseLiquidityCurrentRange.note: Increase liquidity for a specific token ID within the current range.
increaseLiquidityCurrentRange.tokenId-note: Enter the ID of the token for which you want to increase liquidity.
increaseLiquidityCurrentRange.amount0Add-note: Specify the amount of token0 to add.
increaseLiquidityCurrentRange.amount1Add-note: Specify the amount of token1 to add.
increaseLiquidityCurrentRange.amount0Min-note: Specify the minimum amount of token0 to accept.
increaseLiquidityCurrentRange.amount1Min-note: Specify the minimum amount of token1 to accept.

withdrawTokenId.note: Withdraw a specific token ID to a designated address.
withdrawTokenId.recipient-note: Enter the address where the token ID should be sent.
withdrawTokenId.token-note: Enter the address of the token contract.
withdrawTokenId.tokenId-note: Enter the ID of the token to withdraw.

swap.note: Perform a swap between two tokens.
swap.amountIn-note: Amount of token to swap in.
swap.amountOutMinimum-note: Minimum amount of token to receive.
swap.sqrtPriceLimitX96-note: Price limit for the swap in Q64.96 format.
swap.isUseFirstSwapParams-note: Specify whether to use the first set of swap parameters.

editParams.note: Update the parameters for swapping tokens. You can modify either the first or the second swap parameters.
editParams.tokenIn-note: Address of the token being swapped from
editParams.tokenOut-note: Address of the token being swapped to
editParams.isEditFirstParams-note: Indicate whether you are editing the first swap parameters or the second

retryMessage.note: Resend a previously failed message by specifying the sender chain, addresses, nonce, and payload.
retryMessage.senderChainId-note: The ID of the sender's blockchain network.
retryMessage.senderAndReceiverAddresses-note: A combined byte representation of the sender and receiver addresses.
retryMessage.nonce-note: The unique message nonce for the failed message.
retryMessage.payload-note: The message payload to be retried.

setLzSender.note: Update the LayerZero sender address that will send messages to this contract.
setLzSender.lzSender-note: The address of the LayerZero sender.

setRewardTokenLZParams.note: Configure LayerZero parameters for the reward token.
setRewardTokenLZParams.zroPaymentAddress-note: Address to pay ZRO fees for LayerZero transactions.
setRewardTokenLZParams.adapterParams-note: Extra parameters for the LayerZero adapter.

editPool.note: Modify the parameters of an existing pool.
editPool.poolId-note: The ID of the pool to be edited.
editPool.payoutStart-note: The timestamp when payouts will start.
editPool.decreaseInterval-note: The interval after which the rewards will decrease.
editPool.withdrawLockPeriod-note: The lock period after staking during which withdrawals are not allowed.
editPool.claimLockPeriod-note: The lock period during which claims cannot be made.
editPool.withdrawLockPeriodAfterStake-note: The additional lock period after a stake is made.
editPool.rewardDecrease-note: The amount by which the reward decreases over time.
editPool.minimalStake-note: The minimum stake required to participate.
editPool.isPublic-note: Indicates whether the pool is public or private.

manageUsersInPrivatePool.note: Manage users' participation and staking amounts in a private pool.
manageUsersInPrivatePool.poolId-note: The ID of the private pool to manage.
manageUsersInPrivatePool.users-note: A list of addresses of users participating in the private pool.
manageUsersInPrivatePool.amounts-note: The corresponding staking amounts for each user.

choose-asset-step.title: Please select the token for deposit:

use-swap.tx-sent-message: The transaction was sent, you can view it in the explorer here
use-swap.success-message: The transaction was confirmed, you can view it in the explorer here

referral-info.title: Referral System
referral-info.subtitle: Rates for Referrals
referral-info.description-1: Create your own referral link, share it with others, and earn bonuses!
referral-info.description-2: Your referral rate depends on the amount of stETH deposited by people using your link. When a user deposits stETH with your referral link, you, as the referrer, can earn up to a 5% bonus in MOR tokens.
referral-info.description-3: Additionally, other users who deposit stETH using your link will receive a 1% bonus on their deposits.
referral-info.connect-wallet: Connect Wallet to see your Referral System

referral-system-info.title: Referral System
referral-system-info.description-1: Share your referral link with others and earn bonuses!
referral-system-info.description-2: Your referral rate depends on the amount of stETH deposited by users who use your referral link. The larger the total deposits from referees, the higher your bonus.

ref-bonus-modal.title: Claim Referral Bonus
ref-bonus-modal.text-1: You are about to claim your referral bonus. Please check the information below and confirm the action. Your current reward - {reward}.
ref-bonus-modal.text-2: Please enter your wallet address for the claim in the field below.
ref-bonus-modal.tx-sent-message: The transaction was sent, you can view it in the explorer here
ref-bonus-modal.success-message: The transaction was confirmed, you can view it in the explorer here

delegation-description.title:
Maximize Your
Token Potential
delegation-description.subtitle-1: Stake your tokens to Subnets and let them handle the work while your staked balance grows. Take full advantage of staking today!
delegation-description.bullet-text-1: Discover detailed stats about subnets to make the best choice.
delegation-description.bullet-text-2: Stake in seconds: just select the subnet and set tokens amount.
delegation-description.subtitle-2: Click "Stake" and put your tokens to work today!

delegate-tokens-modal.title: Stake
delegate-tokens-modal.description-1: You will be able to claim staked tokens after the Subnet deregistration.
delegate-tokens-modal.tx-sent-message: The transaction was sent, you can view it in the explorer here
delegate-tokens-modal.success-message: The transaction was confirmed, you can view it in the explorer here

delegate-subnet-modal.title: Become a Subnet
delegate-subnet-modal.link-placeholder: Specify the link to your Subnet
delegate-subnet-modal.fee-placeholder: Set a profit fee for the Subnet
delegate-subnet-modal.fee-note: The fee that is specified in a certain percentage is charged to the user's yield every time the user claimed the tokens.
delegate-subnet-modal.address-placeholder: Specify the address to which the fee will be sent
delegate-subnet-modal.tx-sent-message: The transaction was sent, you can view it in the explorer here
delegate-subnet-modal.success-message: The transaction was confirmed, you can view it in the explorer here

delegator-info-cards.total-fee: Total Fee Charged by Subnet in {asset}
delegator-info-cards.tx-sent-message: The transaction was sent, you can view it in the explorer here
delegator-info-cards.success-message: The transaction was confirmed, you can view it in the explorer here

builders-form.subtitle: Complete this form to become a Morpheus builder and launch your Subnet.
builders-form.name-note: What is the name of your project? This is how users will find your project.
builders-form.address-note: This address will be able to edit information about the Subnet
builders-form.website-note: Link to the Subnet website.  Example: “https://…”
builders-form.image-url-note: Link to the Subnet image.  Example: “https://…”
builders-form.lock-period-after-stake-plh: Withdraw lock period after the stake
builders-form.lock-period-after-stake-note: After each stake, the user will not be able to withdraw his deposit this time
builders-form.claim-lock-end-plh: Max Stakers claim lock end timestamp
builders-form.claim-lock-end-note: Stakers will be able to lock their claim until this timestamp. Affects the Power Factor. Example: "05 Jul 2030 02:00 PM"
builders-form.emissions-fee-plh: % of the MOR Emissions the Subnet receives
builders-form.treasury-fee-note: % of the MOR emissions that the Subnet receives will be transferred to the current address. Example: '0xabc…123'
builders-form.confirm-success-msg: The transaction was confirmed, you can view it in the explorer here

builders-stake-modal.power-factor-tooltip: The power factor depends on the claim lock timestamp, the longer the claim lock, the larger the power factor.
builders-stake-modal.stake-success-msg: The transaction was confirmed, you can view it in the explorer here

builders-claim-modal.protocol-fee-lbl:
% of the MOR emission 
 the Protocol receives
builders-claim-modal.emissions-lbl:
% of the MOR emissions 
 the Subnet receives

builder-withdraw-modal.withdraw-amount-note: Enter the number of tokens you want to withdraw
builder-withdraw-modal.withdraw-success-msg: The transaction was confirmed, you can view it in the explorer here

builders-list.title: Create or Stake in a Builder
builders-list.description: You can become a Builder or participate in an existing one to start earning rewards. When you create a Builder, you can set custom parameters including token lock time and reward details. Or you can join an existing Builder by staking MOR.
builders-list.description-underline: Start staking now and claim your rewards!

builders-item.page-err-msg: Look's like the builder subnet you are looking for is not exists
builders-item.lock-period-lbl: Withdraw lock period after the stake
builders-item.fee-emissions-lbl: % of the MOR Emissions the Subnet receives
builders-item.claim-success-msg: The transaction was confirmed, you can view it in the explorer here

builders-creation-modal.modal-description: Creating a subnet costs {price} MOR, the funds will be taken from your connected wallet.
builders-creation-modal.balance-after-lbl: MOR balance after the Subnet creation
